Anger.effect: Deal 6 (8) damage. Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.

Armaments.effect: Gain 5 Block. Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

Body Slam.effect: Deal damage equal to your Block.

Clash.effect: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14 (18) damage.

Flex.effect: Gain 2 (4) Strength. At the end of this turn, lose 2 (4) Strength.

Havoc.effect: Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.

Headbutt.effect: Deal 9 (12) damage. Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Heavy Blade.effect: Deal 14 damage. Strength affects this card 3 (5) times.

Perfected Strike.effect: Deal 6 damage. Deals 2 (3) additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike".

Sword Boomerang.effect: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3 (4) times.

Thunderclap.effect: Deal 4 (7) damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

True Grit.effect: Gain 7 Block. Exhaust 1 card at random.

Warcry.effect: Draw 1 card. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

Wild Strike.effect: Deal 12 (17) damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.

Battle Trance.effect: Draw 3 (4) cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn.

Blood for Blood.effect: Costs 1 less [R] for each time you lose HP this combat. Deal 18 (22) damage.

Combust.effect: At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP and deal 5 (7) damage to ALL enemies.

Dark Embrace.effect: Whenever a card is Exhausted, draw 1 card.

Dropkick.effect: Deal 5 (8) damage. If the enemy has Vulnerable, gain [R] and draw 1 card.

Dual Wield.effect: Choose an Attack or Power card. Add a copy of that card into your hand.

Evolve.effect: Whenever you draw a Status card, draw 1 card.

Feel No Pain.effect: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain 3 (4) Block.

Fire Breathing.effect: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, deal 6 (10) damage to ALL enemies.

Flame Barrier.effect: Gain 12 (16) Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 (6) damage back.

Infernal Blade.effect: Add a random Attack into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Intimidate.effect: Apply 1 (2) Weak to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Metallicize.effect: At the end of your turn, gain 3 (4) Block.

Power Through.effect: Add 2 Wounds into your hand. Gain 15 (20) Block.

Rage.effect: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 3 (5) Block.

Rampage.effect: Deal 8 damage. Increase this card's damage by 5 (8) this combat.

Reckless Charge.effect: Deal 7 (10) damage. Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

Rupture.effect: Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain 1 (2) Strength.

Searing Blow.effect: Deal 12 (16) damage. Can be Upgraded any number of times.

Second Wind.effect: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Gain 5 (7) Block for each card Exhausted.

Sentinel.effect: Gain 5 Block. If this card is Exhausted, gain [R] [R].

Sever Soul.effect: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Deal 16 (22) damage.

Shockwave.effect: Apply 3 (5) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Spot Weakness.effect: If the enemy intends to attack, gain 3 (4) Strength.

Uppercut.effect: Deal 13 damage. Apply 1 (2) Weak. Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

Whirlwind.effect: Deal 5 (8) damage to ALL enemies X times.

Barricade.effect: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

Berserk.effect: Gain 2 (1) Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, gain [R].

Brutality.effect: At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.

Corruption.effect: Skills cost 0. Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.

Demon Form.effect: At the start of your turn, gain 2 (3) Strength.

Double Tap.effect: This turn, your next Attack is played twice.

Exhume.effect: Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand. Exhaust.

Feed.effect: Deal 10 (12) damage. If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 3 (4). Exhaust.

Fiend Fire.effect: Exhaust your hand. Deal 7 (10) damage for each card Exhausted. Exhaust.

Immolate.effect: Deal 21 (28) damage to ALL enemies. Add a Burn into your discard pile.

Juggernaut.effect: Whenever you gain Block, deal 5 (7) damage to a random enemy.

Offering.effect: Lose 6 HP. Gain [R] [R]. Draw 3 (5) cards. Exhaust.

Reaper.effect: Deal 4 (5) damage to ALL enemies. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. Exhaust.
